helpText:
This program is used to install APK files on Windows Subsystem for Android.
Before using WSA Sideloader, make sure you:
1. Installed Windows Subsystem for Android
2. Enabled developer mode (open WSA Settings and enable developer mode)
WSA Sideloader can install APK, XAPK, APKM and APKS files.
For more information and support, visit the GitHub page.
onlyApkSupported: Only APK, XAPK, APKM and APKS files are supported
startingWait: Starting WSA, please wait 30 seconds before trying again.
instAppsAdbAllow: Please allow the ADB connection and try again.
instAppsError:
Please check that WSA is running, the correct ADB address has
been entered in settings and you allowed the ADB connection.
If you denied the ADB connection, close and reopen WSA
Sideloader.
adbEmpty: ADB address cannot be empty. You can fix this in settings.
bundleInstallPatient: Depending on the file size, this may take a while. Please be patient.
appInstalled: The application has been successfully installed.
allowAdb: Please allow the ADB connection and run the installation again.
unableToInstall:
Unable to install the application. Please check that:
- The file is valid
- WSA is running
- Developer mode is enabled in WSA settings
- The correct ADB address has been entered in the WSA Sideloader settings
- You allowed the ADB connection. If you denied by mistake, close and reopen WSA Sideloader.

[Error Info]
newUpdate:
A newer version of WSA Sideloader is available.
Would you like to update now?
wsaNotDetectedWin10:
WSA installation not detected.
To use this program, make sure you have Windows Subsystem for Android installed on your PC.
wsaNotDetectedWin11:
WSA installation not detected.
To use this program, make sure you have Windows Subsystem for Android installed on your PC.
installingBundleApks: Installing base APK and supporting files...
checkUpdatesAppStart: Check for updates on application start:
fatalError:
Sorry, an error has occurred. Please submit a bug report.

[Error Info]
